name: Sorcerer's Choice: Angel or Demon?
description:
When Lucil's home is attacked by a violent mob, his grandfather teleports him to safety. Burned and battered, Lucil is aware of two beings standing over him: one of Light, and one of Darkness.

Which hand will he take? What fate awaits him when he chooses?

Sorcerer's Choice: Angel or Demon? is a lush Boys Love fantasy visual novel featuring beautiful artwork and accomplished voice acting. The struggle between heaven and hell has never been so thrilling!

Lucil has been left very bitter by the betrayal of the townsfolk, which makes him quick to anger and closed off from his magic. Can he learn to trust again?

Flow is an eccentric angel determined to help humanity however he can, even if it comes at great personal cost. But when he falls in love with Lucil, he faces the greatest of tests: will he risk falling from Heaven's grace for love?

Lobelia is a seductive demon. He wants his way with Lucil's body in exchange for healing him, and seems straightforward in his motivations. But can a creature of darkness really be so simple? What's his real motivation?
